details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.4 Headings - 7.4.4 Unnumbered headings - Number of H
details.description: Each node in the tag tree shall contain at most one child H tag.

rule.description: Each node in the tag tree shall contain at most one child H tag.

error.message: A node contains more than one H tag
